Posts.Content: I am 39 and was diagnosed as well last week.. i have a 6 year old daughter, and i feel the same.. so scared, of what i have to face moving forward. I just finished healing from a pulmonary embolism, and now this... I was diagnosed with dcis, which is a very early form, they seem very positive.. You need to stay as positive as you can. every day you will get stronger..
Posts.Title: 32 and recently diagnosed
